decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (MD4032-03/EX-01/SP Rev B,  MD4032-03/EX-02/SP, MD4032-03/EX-03/SP, MD4032-03/EX-04/SP Rev B, MD4032-03/EX-05/SP Rev B and MD4032-03/EX-06/SP Rev B Received: 26 January 2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The extension hereby approved shall be used solely as part of the house known as 8 Sherringham Avenue, Feltham TW13 7JW and shall not be occupied as a separate dwelling nor used for business purposes and the premises shall not be used as a house in multiple occupation, including any use within Class C4 of The Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (as amended) or such other legislation as may subsequently supersede it.
description: Erection of a part single/ part two storey side extension and a single storey rear extension to the house
